job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtBefore you apply for the position we ask you to try out our mobile app You can download it from httpsnewslymepagelinkLb4P We believe people who love the app have a higher probability of wanting to work with usltpgtltpgtIf you can also rate it 5 starts at the store we would highly appreciate itltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe ideal candidates favourite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtDesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtCollaborate with the engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in a quantitative field Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Engineering etcltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience in quantitative analytics or data modellingltligtltligtDeep understanding of predictive modelling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsltligtltligtFluency in a programming language Python R C C Java SQLltligtltligtFamiliarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools Cassandra Hadoop Spark Tableaultligtltulgt
